item.title: Azure Databricks - mind map - key concepts
item.author: Author
item.description: As part of my recent deep dive into Azure Databricks, I’ve created a mindmap that outlines and connects some of its core concepts. This mindmap serves as a visual guide to help you navigate the powerful capabilities of Databricks and understand how its key components interrelate. Explore essential areas like: 📊 Data Management 🗄️: Centralized governance, cataloging, and access control. 🛠️ Data Engineering 📊: Tools for building data pipelines, notebooks, and version control.
